entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming east 30 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 16 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023
